name: Aguraki (YoannClaude)
description:
Make your way through the level by shooting enemies and changing color at the right time.

This is a game released for the GameCodeur GameJam n°33.

It's a demake of Ikaruga (sort of) created with Löve2d and Tiled.

Game and music by YoannClaude with the participation of Digital Fox.

All rights reserved
